name: Little Stars for Little Wars 2
description:
Little Stars for Little Wars 2 is a simple Real-Time Strategy (RTS) game!

You have a simple goal: move through the neutral star systems and capture all enemy systems.

You will lose yourself in fun levels, ranging from amusing to mind-challenging!

The galaxy has plunged into chaos and little wars have broken out along the border. Fleets are standing by for you to take control of the battlefield. Form your strategy, conquer enemy systems, and claim victory for your forces!

Little Stars for Little Wars 2 features:
- 162 levels! “Deep Cosmos” and “A Song of Quasars” are available now!
- Waypoints: create waypoints for quick and easy control over the battlefield. (touch and drag)
- Upgrades: specialize your star systems to fortify their defensive capabilities, or, advance their ship production.
- Multi language support. English, Russian, German and more to come
- Beautiful and atmospheric electronic soundtrack by Trevor Golas
- Multitouch: pinch to zoom, tap to control
- High replayability: Time and efficiency challenges for each level!
- Control the game speed by swiping on the bottom of the screen
- Leaderboards to enjoy the game with your friends
- Many achievements to get
